name: easyScan Data File
summary: Learn about .EZD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Nanosurf easyScan is a system that allows physicists to image a material, make nanometer-scale measurements, and record other topographic and spectrographic data. An easyScan system consists of an AFM or STM and accompanying easyScan control software. Physicists create EZD files by saving measurements within easyScan control software.

instructions: You can open an EZD file in Nanosurf easyScan 2 control software by selecting File â†’ Open from the program's menu bar. If you no longer have access to easyScan 2 (because the software is in the process of being discontinued), you can open your EZD file in Nanosurf NaioAFM or NaioSTM control software.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
